s.text: And the only way I have ever enjoyed eating fish is deep fried in batter, wrapped in newsprint.

Yes, yes, I know, because of insurance and third parties, there is no true market for healthcare, but we should try to approximate one as best we can, so that people's real desires (and not some political hack's view of them)determine the structure of healthcare.
Some of the biggest drops in death rates have been among the poor and racial minorities.
Some of the biggest drops in death rates have been among the poor and racial minorities.

Katha, No, I'm in favor of abolishing the British National Health Service altogether, and letting the market take care of most people's healthcare, and the government coming in to rescue those who fall through the cracks.

Katha, No, I'm in favor of abolishing the British National Health Service altogether, and letting the market take care of most people's healthcare, and the government coming in to rescue those who fall through the cracks.
The notion that large numbers of people who need the meds can't get them is, I think, overstated.
